formElement.label: ESX Connection:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.

formElement.label: VM Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the virtual machine to get the information from.

formElement.label: Number of VMs:
formElement.documentation: Number of virtual machines from which to get information (default is 1). If the value is greater than 1, a suffix is added to VM names. The suffix consists of an underscore and the VM number ('_#').

formElement.label: Results location:
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander location to store properties containing information about the virtual machines (default is '/myJob/ESX/vms').

formElement.label: Create Resource?:
formElement.documentation: Flag to specify whether or not to create ElectricCommander resources for the virtual machines (default is false).

formElement.label: Resource Pool(s):
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander resource pool names to be associated with the created resources if created.

formElement.label: Commander Workspace:
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander workspace the resource should use.

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
